AI Description: HicExplorer is a software package designed for the analysis, visualization, and interpretation of Hi-C data, which is used to study the 3D organization of the genome.
Core Features: Processing & Normalization Of Hi-C Data, Identification Of Topologically Associated Domains (Tads), Visualization Of Hi-C Contact Matrices, Detection Of Chromatin Loops, Analysis Of Interaction Frequencies Between Genomic Regions
General Tags: Hi-C Data Analysis, Genome 3D Organization, Genomics
